list_definition.definition: solids, liquids and/or gases in any form, from which everything physical is made

list_ex_of_definition.ex_of_definition: The entire universe is made up of different kinds of matter.

list_definition.definition: a subject or topic (of discussion etc)

list_ex_of_definition.ex_of_definition: The wound was infected and full of matter.
